page.title: 07RELIGION : YATTON CHURCHES
page.content: There are several choices of places of worship for Christians in Yatton.There is a Roman Catholic church, a Methodist church,a non-conformist chapel at kingston Seymour,an Evangelical fellowship, and churches of England at Yatton and Kingston Seymour.The oldest is St.Mary the Virgin in the centre of Yatton.Together with the churches at Kingston Seymour and Kenn, it forms the United Parish of Yatton Moor,and shares the same Rector.There are several organisations connected with St.Marys,among them being the Mothers Union,the Magnets Youth clubs,the Wives Group,playgroup,Youth Fellowship and a mother and toddler group.The parish Church of St.Mary,with its octagonal truncated spire,is a noticeable landmark for miles around.
